query.description: The service you want to be redirected to with a service ticket after being re-authenticated with the transient token. The format is URL-encoded.

request.description:
Returns a transient token. A CAS authentication must have been previously performed.

The login for a given 3DEXPERIENCE service contains three steps. The first step is to retrieve a login ticket from the passport. We execute the /login REST web service with action as query parameter. It is a GET verb.

* [Internal Transient Ticket Documentation](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAATciamPassportWSTransientTokenToc.htm)
* [Internal Endpoint Reference](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportAPIGetTransientToken.htm)

query.description: The "on behalf" person. It can only be a 3DEXPERIENCE platform member, not an administrator. username or email (UTF8 encoded)
The service you want to be redirected to with a service ticket after being re-authenticated with the transient token. The format is URL-encoded.

request.description:
Returns a transient token. A CAS authentication must have been previously performed.

The login for a given 3DEXPERIENCE service contains three steps. The first step is to retrieve a login ticket from the passport. We execute the /login REST web service with action as query parameter. It is a GET verb.

* [Internal Transient Ticket Documentation](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAATciamPassportWSTransientTokenToc.htm)
* [Internal Endpoint Reference](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportAPIGetTransientTokenBehalf.htm)

query.description: The service you want to be redirected to with a service ticket after being re-authenticated with the transient token. The format is URL-encoded.

request.description:
Authenticates a user to the 3DPassport CAS server with a transient token, and optionally can redirect to a provided service URL too.

* [Internal Transient Ticket Documentation](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAATciamPassportWSTransientTokenToc.htm)
* [Internal Endpoint Reference](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportAPILoginTransientToken.htm)

The login for a given 3DEXPERIENCE service contains three steps. The first step is to retrieve a login ticket from the passport. We execute the /login REST web service with action as query parameter. It is a GET verb.

* [Internal Login Documentation](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportLoginHowTo.htm)
* [Internal Endpoint Reference](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportAPILoginTicket.htm)

Authenticates a user to the 3D Passport CAS server, and optionally can redirect to a provided service URL too.
The call must be performed with the same JSESSIONID (stored in cookies) as the one generated by a previous login ticket retrieval call.

* [Internal Login Documentation](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportLoginHowTo.htm)
* [Internal Endpoint Reference](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportAPIAuthentication.htm)

Authenticates a user to the 3D Passport CAS server, and optionally can redirect to a provided service URL too.
The call must be performed with the same JSESSIONID (stored in cookies) as the one generated by a previous login ticket retrieval call.

* [Internal Login Documentation](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportLoginHowTo.htm)
* [Internal Endpoint Reference](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportAPIAuthentication.htm)

Performs single sign on by generating a service ticket for a provided service URL

* [Internal Login Documentation](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportLoginHowTo.htm)
* [Internal Endpoint Reference](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportAPILogin.htm)

Performs single sign on by generating a service ticket for a provided service URL

* [Internal Login Documentation](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportLoginHowTo.htm)
* [Internal Endpoint Reference](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportAPILogin.htm)

Performs single sign on by generating a service ticket for a provided service URL

* [Internal Login Documentation](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportLoginHowTo.htm)
* [Internal Endpoint Reference](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportAPILogin.htm)

The logout is unique for the session. We execute the /logout REST web service. It is a GET verb.

* [Internal Login Documentation](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportLoginHowTo.htm)
* [Internal Endpoint Reference](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/English/CAAiamPassport/CAAiamPassportAPILogout.htm)

header.description:
crypted hash value.
The value is = sha1("7F7316C4CC137143"+platform

request.description:
Retrieves for a given platform all the service URLs. This API is not CAS protected. The authentication is based on a crypted hash key sent along the request and checked service side.  The article Retrieving Platform Service URLs explains how to compute this value

* [Internal Retrieving Platform Service URLs Documentation](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAA3DCompassRESTPro/CAAi3DXCompassRetrievingServiceURL.htm)
* [Internal Endpoint Reference](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAA3DCompassRESTPro/CAAi3DXCompassWSQrServiceURL.htm)

query.description: To return the information for the current connected person.

request.description:
Generates a CSRF token valid for 6W and PN0 web services whose the verb is PUT, PATCH, POST or DELETE.

* [Internal CSRF Documentation](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAARwsServiceGuides/CAARwsServiceCSRF.htm)
* [Internal Endpoint Reference](https://dsxdev-online.dsone.3ds.com/doconline/DSInternalExaDoc.htm?show=CAA3DSpaceREST/CAA3DSpaceWSQrCSRFToken.htm)

query.description:
We can add several fields with comma(,) separator to get in the response.

Available values : dsmvcfg:attribute.isConfigured

request.description:
